name: createIssueTypeScheme
description:
Creates an issue type scheme.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

IssueTypeSchemeDetails.description: Details of an issue type scheme and its associated issue types.

defaultIssueTypeId.description: The ID of the default issue type of the issue type scheme. This ID must be included in `issueTypeIds`.

description.description: The description of the issue type scheme. The maximum length is 4000 characters.

issueTypeIds.description: The list of issue types IDs of the issue type scheme. At least one standard issue type ID is required.

name.description: The name of the issue type scheme. The name must be unique. The maximum length is 255 characters.

$block: The ID of an issue type scheme.

$ul: **issueTypeSchemeId**: The ID of the issue type scheme.
